articles.title: 'All Quiet on the Western Front': What changed in Netflix remake - USA TODAY
articles.description: Oscar-winning 1930 World War I film "All Quiet on the Western Front" is remade on Netflix, from a German perspective. Here's how it's changed.
articles.content:
Remaking an Oscar-winning movie is a dicey proposition. Why mess with success?
But when German director Edward Berger decided to redo Lewis Milestone’s 1930 epic “All Quiet on the Western Front” for… [+6303 chars]
